summary: Implements a collection of helper utilities and test cases that execute a range of distributed collective primitives—such as all‑to‑all exchanges, matrix multiplications, permutation communications, and scalar reductions—and assess their performance and correctness within a roofline‑model benchmarking framework.
business_intent: Provide developers and performance engineers with a reliable way to benchmark, validate, and optimise the throughput and scaling behavior of collective communication operations used in large‑scale parallel model training.
